body.name: BALAPET Adjustable Height Shredded Memory Foam Knee Pillow for Side Sleepers, Pillow Between Legs for Aligns Spine, Supportive Leg Pillow for Pregnancy Relieves Pressure Hip Leg Elevation, 3" Height

features: 【ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT】- Specifically designed for side and back sleepers. This is an gel shredded memory foam leg pillow with a zipper that allows you to adjust the volume of the foam. You can add or remove to adjust the height of the pillow to fit your size, shape or sleeping position. The hip pillow provides soft support for your lower body, relieving pressure in the hips, legs and lower back.

【SHREDDED MEMORY FOAM】- The knee pillow is filled with high quality shredded memory foam, the filling djusts the shape of the pillow to the shape of your body. It fits snugly around your legs and knees when lying down, helping your body maintain a perfectly comfortable position while you sleep.

【PERFECT LONG PILLOW FOR KNEE 】- BALAPET leg pillow is 26 inches in length, long enough to prevent knee bumping and can support each leg including the knee. The full length pillow promotes proper spinal alignment for optimal comfort and provides separation for ideal sleep positions.

【REMOVABLE COOLING COVER】 - The zip closure cover is removable, easy to clean and reusable. 35% viscose made from bamboo blend 65% polyester fabric. Breathable and comfortable, better suited to the skin of your legs and sleeping naked.

【TIPS】- This pillow comes in a compression bag and has been shipped for an extended period of time. When received, the pillow is flat, take it out and leave it for 48 hours for the pillow to expand to the desired height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My boy… get your hips and back right with this thing. Sleep has been a struggle. Had the best consecutive sleeps of my life after I picked this up. Under your knees if you’re a back sleeper, under your hip if you’re a front sleeper, inbetween the thighs if you’re a side sleeper. Thank me later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and my new go to for a supportive knee pillow!
reviews.reviewText: I have issues with both my knees and my hip. In the last year, I've tried probably at least 6 different pillows (mostly knee pillows and body pillows) to help get comfy in bed.This pillow is my current go to!- It's thick and firm enough to offer a lot of support -- but still comfy.- It's long, so it can be used under the knees for back sleeping OR between the knees for side sleeping.It did have a little bit of a smell when I first opened the bag, but that went away by the next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works, with caveats
reviews.reviewText: First off, this pillow is very large and a bit heavy. I can fit my whole leg on it, which I can tell is good for my posture. Its the size of a normal pillow, but the memory foam definitely holds its shape better than my other pillows.The down sides are that it STINKS! Upon opening it, it smelled like VOCs. I let it sit for a few days before taking it into my bedroom, which helped a little. Because of the size and shape its very comfortable while I lay on my side, but a bit awkward when I flip to the other side and very awkward if I want to sleep on my back. It is too high to keep under my knees if I'm on my back, so I have to push it to the side.It does what its supposed to do, and hopefully the smell will continue to dissipate so its not a problem.UPDATE:After a few more days, I determined that the weight is a deal breaker. While it takes stress of the hips and spine, it put more pressure on my knees. It may not be a problem for everyone, but the knee discomfort was a deal breaker for me(my knees weren't back to normal until part way through the next day). I've switched back to using a small pillow with normal, lighter stuffing for my legs and my knees are feeling better. The smell finally dissipated and now this makes a great pillow for under the head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Much larger than I thought!
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised! 4.5" is the perfect height for me; whether to support my knees or to use under my head, it's perfect.4 stars ONLY because it has a very heavy odor that hasn't left quite yet. It's so comfortable that it could smell terrible forever, and I do not think I would mind.The fabric's threading is tight and very soft, and it is very cool on my face. I've been waking up with a little less neck pain--not necessarily because it's simply an ortho pillow, but because of its perfect balance of firmness to the touch and pillowy support with moldability around the head, neck, and face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm yet soft
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I love this pillow. May have to order a second one. A king size pillow case fits it perfectly. It is well made and adjustable in height by removing stuffing. The pillow fully supports my entire leg while side sleeping. It relieves tension in my knee and hip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3” thick is nice
reviews.reviewText: I picked this up to help take stress off one of my knees when side sleeping. The groove in the middle helps my leg stay positioned. It is great that our pillow sheets fit it. No complaints so far.

With all my chronic pain problems, among them my back causing sciatica pain on both sides and osteoarthritis in my knees and ankles, I need a pillow between my legs when sleeping. I was using a regular one but it just wasn't thick enough and I wanted a longer pillow to protect both my knees and ankles better. This pillow fits my requirements perfectly! I'm very pleased with it, I tried it for a nap today and it's exactly what I was looking for. The thickness at 4 inches is much better and I also quite like the firmness of the pillow. It comes in a compressed roll and as soon as it's let out it inflates fast, no issues whatsoever. I used it about an hour after and it was already fully decompressed. I recommend!
